i never ever write in this shit but i figured i should give some sort of an update.  this year has been totally insane. ive gone through boys the way i do my trashy romance novels. it seemed like i could never really find someone that i clicked with. someone who didn't annoy me to the max and wasn't clingy.  i think.  ive found that someone now. James is just like me in alot of ways. we click really well and im happier now since ive been with him then i was before.   

school wise ive been a bad bad girl.  i skip it way too often and when i do go i never get any work done unless im working on a client. it's not that the work bors me, it's just that i hate working on my doll and the stupid rules that the managment keeps making.  like if you're a minute late you get an absent day/15$ fee. not cool.  im pretty much almost done tho.  probably like 200 or less hours left. it should go by fast. i still love the cosmetology profession tho.  so if anyone needs their hair cut or dyed let me know. 

work. oh jeez how i dislike it. stupid fucking target.  either you're getting yelled at for not taking a break or not showing up when the break schedule differs from the one the manager has.   im so close to being fired i swear. yet they haven't done it yet.  i hope i don't tho cuz ive got too much debt w/my dad.  i hit a dear a couple weeks ago and have to pay my dad back for fixing my car. ugh. and i owe money to school.  im gonna be soo poor.  i need to find another job. preferably in a salon. 

ive been partying way too much lately. anyone want to party it up with me?

I'm really mad at my dad right now. On Monday he got really pissed at me for lecturing Peter, telling him that we needed to leave since I was bringing him to work and since i was being nice because this weekend he had been mean to me so i didn't have to bring him anyways (wow long run on.) So my dad was full on screaming at me and came at me with a cooking spoon in his hand like he was going to hit me.  It was insane and scary. I've never in my life seen my dad this mad before. It really upset me because i didn't do anything wrong.  He's the one that's been a jerk to me all weekend long.  On Saturday we went to newport so that peter could visit a friends and the whole time my dad was yelling at me about not believing in god and calling me a liar because he dream that I said something mean about Peter before we left.  I didn't say anything about Peter except that he was sleeping and that dad should wake him up if we were going to leave soon.  It really hurts me when he calls me a liar since I don't lie anymore.  I know i used to lie alot about little things when I was in high school but I have outgrown that.  I hope he apologizes because I'd like to have a relationship with him and if he keeps treating me shitty then I don't think i can . 

So all weekend I'd been sneezing like crazy because of my allergies.  Then last night around 11:30pm i started wheezing and coughing up mucus.. (wicked gross.)  It got soo bad that by 4:30am i couldn't really breathe well.  So I woke up my mom and she called the doctor and the she told my mom that I should go to the hospital.  It was scary since I couldn't breathe. The doctor in the ER told me that I had had an allergy induced asthma attack.  So now I have an inhaler and am on some sort of steroid. oh what fun.
http://sporad1c-ra1n.livejournal.com/37038.html

Things have been going very well for me lately. 
I had camp orientation this week and I start camp monday. 
I'll be doing after camp @ sunrise park on mondays+fridays.
I met a really nice guy today.
Too bad he's illegal.

Tomorrow is my 20th birthday. 
It's weird because I still feel like a more mature version of my sixteen yrold self. 
Im doing the same things I did back then minus going to high school. 

Mom, Peter and I are going to Newport, RI for our bday.We leave today and come back tomorrow. It's suposed to be for both of us but I feel like we're just going for Peter. He wants to go to visit his friend Joe on friday. I wish there was something fun i could do for my birthday but my only good friend I'd wanna share it with is six hours away. Hopefully the Lake George things happens and I get to visit Peter in Ireland. That'd be the best.
http://sporad1c-ra1n.livejournal.com/36696.html

Life lately has been wicked uneventful.  I work at the Surgery Center in Enfield now doing all the crap work that the nurses don't want to do (like: making beds, cleaning IV poles, getting packages, stocking stuff, ect.)  It's a pretty sucky job but it pays good, way better than minimun wage.

Camp is going to be starting soon.  It's gonna be weird this year since I'm Assistant Director and most of the counselors are guys unlike in the past.  But it'll be just as fun and at least I don't have to put up with Lisa as Director.  I've gotta start looking at Cosmetology schools and pick one soon since Salve needs to know what school I'm going to for Peter's financial aid.

summer is gonna be pretty okay but the ending will be the best.  Since i'll be meeting Jess (&possibly Rachael) at Lake George for a couple days of great fun. I can't wait.

im going home tomorrow. or later today i guess.  i can't sleep. i guess i must be too excited to be going home. most of my stuff is all packed up. our room looks so depressing.  as much as i hate rooming w/jess, im going to miss hanging out w/ her every day and having meals together. i am not going to miss all the shitty food here or the hills or the jerky ppl who talk way to loud in the dining hall. im gonna miss being able to see a comedian almost every week.  i wont miss the fake friends of made here. ya know the ones that you see once in awhile. the ones that say they'll hang out with you and then never make plans or show up.  or the ones who borrow money and then buy pot instead of paying you back.  it seems no  matter where i go i am always surrounded by fake friends. people who use me or lie to me or both. im sick of it. 

when i go home the only friend i'll have is peter and im totally okay with that.  especially now that he can keep a secret.  it's gonna be really sad when he goes off to ireland in august and i'll be left at home to be bitched at every day by my mom.  im gonna miss him alot and im gonna be way jealous. lol. that lucky jerk.  im really proud of that guy.  he makes the deans list every semester and works his ass off even though there are more fun things he could be doing.  i wish i could be like that but i just hate writing and school work that isn't going to help me with my future job at all. it is pointless. i need to have a reality check and get my butt in gear. i can't keep slacking off. im just not cut out for school. which has screwed me. now im going to have to pay my parents shit loads of money for the past semesters fuck ups.  also i'll probalby have to pay for cosmetology school on my own. at least that is only 5 thousand. 

this summer is gonna be filled w/ working non-stop. so if you want to hang w/me then it'll have to be free because i won't have any money. especially since im paying for my own car insurance and gas now. im gonna be a poor bitch this summer. lol.  the only real fun im gonna have is when i go to lake george w/jess,mike,and a friend of my choice. idk who yet. it'll probably just be peter.

im probably gonna go play the sims now.  

night night.

i am so bored right now. i probably should be doing all that work my teachers have been pile-ing on these last couple weeks but i really don't feel like it.  i am so sick of school.  my brain is in this mode where it knows that im not going to be going on in the early childhood field so it doesn't feel like doing any of the work for my early childhood classes. it's pointless for me. BUTBUTBUT i need to do good in my classes or my parents will make me pay them back. which would suck since it's like 18 thousand dollars. ugh. im so screwed.

im wicked pissed at maia right now.  i lent her money to get her lip pierced before spring break [which was in march]. she still owes me $15 and i come to find that she's been spending all her money on pot and telling me that she has none cuz she has to pay for her meds. zomg. i have nothing against smoking but if you owe someone money you should pay them back before you go and "have fun". im sick of being lied to.  if i don't get my money back soon, i think im going to have to start stalking her. im gonna get my money back by the end of the semester no matter what.  i won't be used.

has been pretty boring.  I miss fartin' around w/Jess everyday. I don't miss the food at Champlin. It's crap. School's been going well except for me sleeping/playing the sims instead of going to class or doing hw.  I've gotta crack down more.  I've met some cool girls at school and some cunts who mess up my drawings and steal my markers. gh3yness. 

I got in a fight with Siena yesterday. she's been talking to this guy online named Gideon for a few months. well i guess he sent her a diamond necklace and earings. [ive seen them but i don't know if they're real] and she thinks that is okay. it's INSANE!  You don't accept gifts like that from someone you don't even know.  
I tried to tell her how i felt about all this but she just told me that i needed to grow up and "you know what you're bein a bitch i can't handle it. talk to me when you're ready to play nice.  cuz i still feel i can't trust you" 

She lies to me constantly and I'm the one that can't be trusted? That's retarded.  I only told her the truth and how I feel. She's kind acting like Laura was last jan/feb. I don't need shitty friends like this cuz I'm the only one that ends up getting hurt.

saturday was leRoy's lunch date.  laura was there. and it seemed like she felt awkward being around me.  i wonder why she hasn't gotten over it and can't at least be civil. whenever she'd notice me looking at her while she was talking to the group she would immediately look away.  it's kind of immature i think. just like that time she was serving me at panera. i asked for a lemonade icee and she gave me a cup filled with chopped up ice and a lemon at the bottom. so not a lemonade ice. i didn't complain because peter was there and he didn't want me to make a fuss.  i guess i still kinda of wish deep down were were friends again but only if she was like she was when we were in high school. she's seemed to become a totally different person now. someone i would not want to be friends with.  im glad that i have good friends now. karen and siena. i don't know what i would do without them. 

sharky b aka alex bridges is talking to me right now.  it's been way too long and i miss him.  i think over the summer siena and i will go visit him. and that's a promise. i know ive said that in the past but this time it's actually going to happen. we'll have an awesome time while alex jokes and tries to get us to smoke pot with him.  i remember when he wanted me to get drunk and high for the first time with him and only him. i remember when we would talk almost every night for three hours. i miss that. maybe i'll call him sometime this week. it's been almost a year and i still remember his phone number. i have the weirdest memory. 

oh & siena and i have made up. no more fighting for us. at least not for a very long time. i hope.
http://sporad1c-ra1n.livejournal.com/31596.html

yesterday was the worst day ive had in sixth months.  it started out going good and then there was a huge downfall. i wish she would just listen to me. she doesn't understand how she is hurting me. if she would just open up her mind and realize that not everyone is the nice person they seem to be then everything would be alright. she is one of those ppl that trusts everyone at first and then ends up getting hurt when they aren't who they seem to be. i don't want her to get hurt AND i definately don't want her ending up going to chicago to meet this guy and then have something really horrible happen. we haven't had a fight like this since middle school. i wish she would just stop thinking about how she feels and start thinking about how i feel when she shuts me out. she doesn't understand that im scared. i don't want anything bad to happen to her. she's my best friend and i don't want to lose her. i dunno what i would do without her and what she would do without me. her life is so messed up. im the one who catches her falls. so when i go away who will be there for her? who will make sure that she doesn't run away and calm her down and give her good advice when she gets in a huge fight with her mom? no one. because we'll all be away.  in scared she's going to hurt herself. and i don't know what else to do.

im coming home tomorrow.

made silly jokes and saying that pretty girls shouldn't cry.

so my nana ended up not having surgery on friday. they knocked her out. and then went through their check list at the hospital. apparently whoever was supposed to get the extra blood forgot. so they couldn't do the surgery. she's having the surgery tomorrow tho. 

also my uncle larry was admitted to the hospital too. his leg is infected. this is a cause of the diabetes he has. larry's twin brother, my uncle steve, died a few years ago because of diabetes and the events leading to his death started w/ his leg becoming infected. my dad doesn't think that larry will die. mostly because the doctors identified the problem earlier than they did w/ steve. 

hopefully both of them will be fine. 

peter went back to school today. im going to miss him but sometimes i wont because he makes me so mad. he told mom that i was thinking about getting my septum pierced and she totally flipped. she said that i couldn't live with her if i did and that she would tell my dad. which would make him angry but i still think he would let me live with him. and they don't even have to know if i get it pierced or not if i get it done w/ a circular barbell. i wish peter would just not open his mouth. he can't keep a secret. which is sad. 

oh a happier note, im getting more and more psyched for going away to college. all ive got to do to guarantee that mom will pay my way is to get a C or better in all my classes. that is gonna be tough when it comes to history but maybe i can get my teacher to let me do some extra credit. she seems nice enough. i really need to get out of here.  i am just reminded too much of the past and i want to forget all about the people who hurt me so much. i can't forget unless i get away from the things that remind me. i saw jillian at the mall on friday morning. it was kind of depressing. but i didn't say anything to her. i wouldn't anyways because her mother was there. one of the few people that i actually hate. i don't think she saw me. which is good. i still don't understand how a perfectly great friendship could just fall to pieces like it did. it's sad.

wow that wasn't much of a happy note. but w/e.
